comments.body: Gambling is generally for everyone who have money or who don't have enough money, you can earn 20 dollars every month and gamble with $2 every month, you just need to cut your clothes to your own size. Bitcoin is safer because it's not a gambling platform, that's a valid point but you can still lose money with Bitcoin as well, hackers can steal your coins from you if you are not very careful with what you do online. Be responsible with everything, nothing is safe because everything carries a risk at least, not even our lives are safe, we sleep everyday and wake up the following morning, but not everyone walked up the next day, some died in their sleep. All you need is understanding what you are getting into, understand the risks of gambling vs the risk of investing in Bitcoin, and be responsible enough to keep your financial life safe from possible never ending debts.

comments.author: Japinat
comments.body: Why bother choosing to invest only when we can both invest and gamble at the same time? I guess you have to understand that if everyone holds Bitcoin, it's not good for the future, since it's the demand that will help the market grow. I'd like to tell you that the gambling industry is one of the major demand drivers in crypto.Investing is not suitable for everyone, and neither is gambling, but as individuals, we have our personal preferences. I think the suggestion should be for us to be able to determine the risk and learn how to manage it.

comments.body: Advising a gambler that earns little amount to venture into trading is wrong, because they may not be skilled and would lose out everything. Losing money in gambling is not the only reason gamblers go for alcohol or drug. Other things affects these people, and most of them were alcoholics before going into gambling. So, exaggerating that gambling and trading is the reason for their high intake of alcohol is also wrong. Holding, for low income earners is also bad, because they may not be able to hold for long term. Additionally, games have no comparison to bitcoin, as they're both different things. Bitcoin is used to play games and it's not the only payment method required to play games online. Online gambling sites that accepts cryptocurrency is increasing, and bitcoin heads the cryptocurrency market. Because it lures bitcoin holders to gamble with their coin, doesn't mix bitcoin to the reason of their lifestyle after losing bitcoin in gaming. Your advise of taking less alcohol is very nice, because too much intake of alcohol leads to bad gambling decision. And, when that happens, players lose control of the amount of money wagered in a casino.
